subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: Scottie Reynolds, a sophomore guard, led Villanova to its third trip to the Round of 16 in the past four seasons, as the Wildcats beat Siena 84-72.
snippet: Scottie Reynolds, a sophomore guard, led Villanova to its third trip to the Round of 16 in the past four seasons, as the Wildcats beat Siena 84-72.
